price: 216. Tada, jei jie nepaklūsta tau, sakyk: „Aš nekaltas dėl to, ką jūs darote.“
arabic: فَإِنۡ عَصَوۡكَ فَقُلۡ إِنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-in ʿaṣawka faqul innī barīon mimmā taʿmalūna
